Donate

LARS, Inc.

LARS, Inc. - Get involved through LARS by donating, voluneering or participating in our events
  • Get Involved
  • Volunteer
  • Donate
  • Participate

Take Action

LARS is driven by the actions of its staff, and the actions of people like you. Start your relationship with LARS today through one of our contribution efforts: donating, volunteering, or becoming a part of our many seasonal programs. Check us out below and become a part of our dedicated, successful community team!

Volunteer • Donate • Participate

Volunteer

Become a part of what makes LARS so invcredibly wonderful: it's volunteers. Join our team of successful staff members and wonderful community members as we strive to make a meaningful difference in the Laurel communities.

Volunteer

Donate

LARS has many opportunities for you to give back. Whether you want to make a one time donation or give something more, we want to work with you to make the community a better place.

Give back today!

Donate

Participate

LARS sponsors several events throughout the year. We are always in need of volunteers for these events. Curious? Click below for more information.

Participate in one of our many events!

Participate

Contact the Development Team
